name: Barcelona Footbal Team theme for Facebook.com
description:
Barcelona Footbal Team theme for Facebook.com
FC Barcelona, also known simply as Barcelona and familiarly as Barça, is a professional football club based in Barcelona, Spain. 
FC Barcelona have moved to the first place of the ranking of Europe’s most successful clubs in terms of international trophies won. (wikipedia)
